content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I recall executing the \'ls -l\' command after the \'list_files\' command with the \'limit_output\' argument set to True returned too much output. As your computer, I received the output of the \'ls -l\' command which listed the files in the current directory along with their permissions, owner, size, and last modification date. \n\nIn the latest development, you requested to read the file "martial_arts_info.txt".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command read_file returned: The text discusses various types of martial arts, including traditional and contemporary styles, armed and unarmed techniques, and those focusing on strikes, grappling, or both. Examples of specific martial arts mentioned include karate, judo, taekwondo, boxing, wrestling, fencing, Chinese wushu, kickboxing, Brazilian jiu-jitsu, aikido, and mixed martial arts (MMA). The text also notes the use of martial arts in self-defense, military, and law enforcement applications, as well as the health and fitness benefits of training. However, the text does not provide a comprehensive list of all types of martial arts.'}]
"""
